profile_explanation: Please enter your personal information. You are the only one who can read or diclose this information. It is required to request your credentials.
request_credential_explanation: Select the credential you need to be issued. This credential is stored in your phone, no one will be able to use it but you.
confirm_request_explanation: Confirm sharing the information requested by the credential issuer.
confirm_sharing: Confirm sharing the information requested by the credential issuer
private_sending_notice: This information will be sent privately to the issuer in order to certify the credentials.
missing_requirements: Incomplete information for the request. Please add it in the profile section.
presentation_error: Error receiving presentation from the server
